attributes.title: Alexa
attributes.review: This app I expected more actually not really what can u expect from a racist person the app is worst than I thought dumb stupid it should be nonexistent trump shouldn’t even exist wait is he rapist or racist he has feeling for his own daughter that’s disgusting a human bean like him shouldn’t exist neither should he have a app to himself there is only crap and bs on there ❤️

attributes.title: AWFUL, SO BAD, AND HORRIFIC
attributes.review: This app truly makes me OFFENDED that it is even on the App Store. I might have to switch to a google phone because I can not stand it being on this platform and that I would support it!!!!! It was gruesome and horrifying to me and my entire family. I hope it is deleted IMMEDIATELY or I will have to take action into my own hands.

attributes.title: Never getting an app for a president ever again!!!
attributes.review: When I opened the app and entered my number, I started getting THOUSANDS of texts sending me pictures or leaked Donald J. Trump photos!! It was HORRIFYING. Then, when I thought the messages stopped, I checked my bank account and saw that ALL of my money was taken and sent to this app!!!! I. am. now. traumatized. and. broke.

attributes.title: Are you serious??
attributes.review: My phone number was apparently leaked because of this app and now i have to get a new phone number! i’m horrified because i have been recieving death threats and that i’m being followed.I was so excited for this app but it did me so so wrong this is disgusting get this off the app store now my life is now in danger

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤮
attributes.review: First of all when I opened it all I saw was a gross Cheeto lookin thing that made me want to puke 🤮 then I realized it was full of more Cheeto things that were pedos. Just when I thought it couldn’t get any worse I realized that the whole(gross) Cheeto community on there were holding an innocent kid captive 😢 worse app ever I would never get it in my life.

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen!😡
attributes.review: I cannot believe I even wasted my time with this so called app. This was recommended to me by my neighbor and I thought I would check it out. I opened it up and guess what I saw, a Cheeto. This was very much fake news and was completely misleading. I had no idea a Cheeto was running for president. Just whatever you do DON’T GET THIS APP! 😡

attributes.title: The rats and roaches where so nice 😍
attributes.review:
first off i open the app and i am greeted with a bunch of rats and roaches. that wasn’t the problem though cuz i was treated really well by them 😘 but dude it was so boring in there like 🥱chile lemme go play minecraft instead 🙄 anyways here’s some advice 

have 🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄

I downloaded this app to confirm the rumors of the Cheeto man for myself and friends. Let just say the rumors are true and that this Cheeto man is scaring. After seeing him I threw up continuously for 12 hours. This app should be banned immediately it is so deadly. 
(for Google)
Pls create a zero star option because even I thing 1 star is to much for this app.

attributes.title: One of the worst apps ever💀
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app 0 stars. One of the first things I saw was *gags* this Cheeto man.🤮Idk why people chose him as the mascot. No way are we supporting a racist, homophobic, sexist, and immature man child of a president. Plus the app quality was rlly bad. Yikes I would expect more for a man who wants to make America great again but can’t even make a decent app.
